node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `suspension` ( `started` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `ends` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `suspension_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `suspendedby_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `suspension_sustype` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `suspension_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, PRIMARY KEY (`suspension_id`), KEY `suspension_sustype` (`suspension_sustype`), KEY `suspendedby_user` (`suspendedby_user`), KEY `suspension_user` (`suspension_user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: suspension
